detailsOfAchievement: Humane Animal Society (HAS) Coimbatore has been tirelessly working towards welfare of stray animals for more than a decade. In the last 10 years of our existence, HAS has touched over 30000 animals to their betterment, and in turn to the betterment of society.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY) is the skilling and placement initiative of the Ministry of Rural Development (MoRD), Government of India. DDU-GKY has its origins in the Aajeevika Skills programme and the ‘Special Projects’ component of the Swarnjayanti Gram Swarozgar Yojana (SGSY). The scheme focuses on catering to the occupational aspirations of rural youth and enhancing their skills for wage employment.
